snippet.title: Ripple Runner Deluxe - Take It to the Limit (No-miss clear)
snippet.description:
Clearing "Take It to the Limit" without any mistakes.  This is the first song I've made for Ripple Runner Deluxe (post-compo edition).
Link: https://ddrkirby.com/games/ripple-runner/ripple-runner.html

Note that the medal doesn't show up for the bonus stage on v1.07, even if you clear the stage without mistakes.  This is fixed in v1.08.

=====
2014/05/11
